---

# Themes

RCI Themes provide the visual layer for our websites, ensuring consistency with the International's brand identity while offering flexibility for local needs.

## Core Theme

### Lenin Theme
The **Lenin Theme** is our primary Full Site Editing (FSE) theme. It serves as the foundation for the majority of our national section websites. It is designed to be:
*   **Fast**: Optimized for Core Web Vitals.
*   **Accessible**: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant.
*   **Flexible**: Block-based architecture.

[Explore Lenin Theme](/docs/themes/lenin)
